    • Method Detail

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady(TaskActionClient taskActionClient)
                throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Execute preflight actions for a task. This can be used to acquire locks, check preconditions, and so on. The actions must be idempotent, since this method may be executed multiple times. This typically runs on the coordinator. If this method throws an exception, the task should be considered a failure. This method must be idempotent, as it may be run multiple times per task.
        Parameters:
        taskActionClient - action client for this task (not the full toolbox)
        Returns:
        true if ready, false if not ready yet
        Throws:
        Exception - if the task should be considered a failure
